prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Archana M
Email: archanamani1995@gmail.com | Mobile: +91 9632866604
Objective
To secure a challenging position that utilizes my education and skills in the field of
information technology to contribute to the success of the organization.
Professional Summary
• 5+ years of total experience, including 5 years in .NET Core, C#, MySQL, and 2
years in Angular.
• Proficient in designing and developing scalable web applications with a strong
focus on backend and frontend technologies.
• Experienced in leading development teams and managing project deliverables
using agile methodologies.
Technical Skills
Primary Skills: .NET Core, Angular, MySQL
Languages: Angular 18, Angular Material, C#, LINQ, HTML, CSS, Java, MS SQL
Frameworks/Technologies: Entity Framework, LINQ, RESTful Services, Dependency
Injection, Design Patterns
Version Control: Git, TFS
Operating Systems: Windows, Ubuntu
Tools: Visual Studio 2019, Visual Studio CodeEducation
• B.E (Information Science and Engineering): 58.9%, VTU, Karnataka (2014-2018)
• PUC (PCMB): 67%, Pre-University Board, Karnataka (2014)
• SSLC: 80%, State Board, Karnataka (2012)
Professional Experience
Product Developer
iTS: Info Technology Supply Ltd, Bangalore (April 2021 – Present)
• Led development of core features for scalable web applications using .NET Core 8
and Angular.
• Implemented JWT token-based authorization and database logic using
NHibernate.
• Designed and developed RESTful APIs and ensured seamless front-end integration.
Junior Software Developer
Creators InfoTek, Bangalore (March 2019 – April 2021)
• Worked on business logic development using Entity Framework and LINQ.
• Created and consumed RESTful services and optimized SQL database
performance.
Projects Undertaken
9to5 App
Role: Product Developer & Team Lead
Environment: .NET 8, SQL, Angular
Responsibilities:
• Managed a team for developing a Clock In/Out application using PWA
technology.• Provided technical guidance, conducted code reviews, and ensured timely project
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
